long_description: The Julbo Bivouak glacier sunglasses provide total coverage and protection from harsh sunlight and extreme weather while skiing or mountaineering. Spectron 4 polycarbonate lenses block 100% of UV rays and 95% of visible light, reducing glare and creating a clear image. Flash treatment gives lenses a mirror effect that enhances light filtration; anti-glare treatment to lenses eliminates glare reflections. Lightweight, tough nylon frames flex to allow a natural fit to various face shapes. Ear stem ends bend in every direction for a good hold and a snug, comfortable fit when worn under helmet, beanie or alone. Grippy inserts at ear stem ends become tacky as you perspire, holding eyewear in place during strenuous activity; does not stick to hair. Unique magnetic shields block light coming from sides; magnetic shields can be easily and quickly removed and repositioned as needed. Front venting incorporated into lenses allows natural airflow to eliminate fog and condensation. Julbo Bivouak glacier sunglasses include a protective case for storage.
short_description: The Julbo Bivouak glacier sunglasses provide total coverage and protection from harsh sunlight and extreme weather while skiing or mountaineering.
